features.name: De juiste mensen
features.text: We geven je de allerbeste programmeurs. Mensen met passie voor hun vak die resultaten boeken. Geen wollig verhaal, maar werkende en eenvoudig te onderhouden code.

features.name: De juiste werkwijze
features.text: We werken Agile, DevOps en Full Stack, van Backend tot Frontend. Met moderne methodologieën als Continuous Integration en Continuous Delivery volg je vanaf dag één zelf live de resultaten.

features.name: Integrating
features.text: We integrate with your current JVM ecosystem. Reuse your libraries, code in your new platform and integrate with your current REST service architecture.

features.name: Get the right people
features.text: We are able to get the best developers for you, because we embrace a technology that attracts top developers. This technology takes friction and boilerplate out of the programming.

features.name: Reduce code
features.text: We were able to reduce the code by 75% at one of our clients. That's 75% less room for errors.

features.name: Partners
features.text: We partner with the leading platform on modern platforms named Typesafe.

features.name: Aftercare
features.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet nihil agere delectat. Ubi est mea annaticula cumminosa.
